nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, a group of undercover Alliance Intelligence agents once ran into an old rival while on a mission to help an Imperial bureaucrat defect to the Rebel Alliance on the planet Bothawui. The Intelligence agents were forced to find a way to keep the rival from blowing their cover before ultimately succeeding in facilitating the defection.
The adventure offers the possible scenario that the rival inadvertently interferes with the agents' mission in such a way as to prevent Imperial forces from stopping the defection.
